        public boolean setRight(Node newRight)
        Sets the right child of this node to be a give node (or null). Also sets the parent of the new child to be this node.
        Parameters:
        newRight - The desired new right child for this node.
        Returns:
        False if the new node can't be the right child of this node, True otherwise.

      • setChild

        public boolean setChild(int newValue)
        Sets a new node (leaf) as a (correct) child of this one (if its key is different).
        Parameters:
        newValue - The value of the node to add.
        Returns:
        True if the new value was added successfully, false otherwise.
